SELECT A.REPLY_NO ,A.REPLY_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(A.REPLY_DATE,'MM.DD HH:MI:SS') AS REPLY_DATE ,A.LECBO_NO ,A.STU_NO ,A.PRO_NO ,(SELECT B.USER_NAME FROM USERS B WHERE B.USER_NO=A.PRO_NO) AS PRO_NAME ,(SELECT C.USER_NAME FROM USERS C WHERE C.USER_NO=A.STU_NO) AS STU_NAME
FROM LECREPLY A WHERE A.LECBO_NO=#{lecboNo} ORDER BY A.REPLY_DATE ASC
